mapper.select: select * from public."apiDetails" order by id asc;

select r."apisId", r.id as resource_id, ad.id, ad."resourceId", ad.method, ad.url, ad.uri, ad.summary, r.garbage, ad.security, ad.scope, ad."operationId", ad.version, ad.status, ad."authorization", r."tagId", ad.trash from public.resource as r join public."apiDetails" as ad on ad."resourceId" = r."id" where "apisId" = #{apisId};

select r."apisId", r.id as resource_id, ad.id, ad."resourceId", ad.method, ad.url, ad.uri, ad.summary, r.garbage, ad.security, ad.scope, ad."operationId", ad.version, ad.status, ad."authorization", r."tagId", ad.trash from public.resource as r join public."apiDetails" as ad on ad."resourceId" = r."id" where ad.id = #{id};
select * from public."apiDetails" inner join public.resource on public.resource.id = public."apiDetails"."resourceId" where public.resource."apisId" = #{apisId};

select public."apiDetails".id,"apisId", re.id as resource_id, garbage, method, url, uri, summary, security, scope, "operationId", version, status, "authorization", re."tagId", trash, "resourceId" from public."apiDetails" inner join public.resource as re on re.id = public."apiDetails"."resourceId" order by public."apiDetails".id asc
mapper.update: UPDATE public."apiDetails" SET method=#{method}, url=#{url}, uri=#{uri}, summary=#{summary}, security=#{security}, scope=#{scope}, "operationId"=#{operationId}, version=#{version}, status=#{status}, "authorization"=#{authorization}, trash=#{trash}, "resourceId"=#{resourceId} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: select distinct ad."resourceId" as id, uri from public."apiDetails" as ad left join public."resource" as re on re.id = ad."resourceId" where ad."resourceId" In (select id from public.resource as re where exists(select 1 from public."apiDetails" as ad where re.id=ad."resourceId" and ad.trash = true)) and re.garbage = false
select Distinct re.id,re.garbage , ad.uri from public."resource" as re join public."apiDetails" as ad on ad."resourceId" = re.id

select r."apisId", r.id as resource_id, ad.id, ad."resourceId", ad.method, ad.url, ad.uri, ad.summary, r.garbage, ad.security, ad.scope, ad."operationId", ad.version, ad.status, ad."authorization", r."tagId", ad.trash from public.resource as r join public."apiDetails" as ad on ad."resourceId" = r."id" where ad.uri ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%') OR ad.summary ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%');

select r."apisId", r.id as resource_id, ad.id, ad."resourceId", ad.method, ad.url, ad.uri, ad.summary, r.garbage, ad.security, ad.scope, ad."operationId", ad.version, ad.status, ad."authorization", r."tagId", ad.trash from public.resource as r join public."apiDetails" as ad on ad."resourceId" = r."id" where ad.uri ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%') OR ad.summary ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%');

SELECT ap.id, ap.method,ap.uri,ap."resourceId" FROM public."apiDetails" as ap join public."resource" as res on res.id = ap."resourceId" where res."apisId" = #{apisId} and ap.uri ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%') and ap.trash = false and res."garbage" = false order by ap.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public."apiDetails"( method, url, uri, summary, security, scope, "operationId", version, status, "authorization", trash, "resourceId") VALUES (#{method}, #{url}, #{uri}, #{summary}, 'Bearer', #{scope}, #{operationId}, 'V1', 'develop', #{authorization}, #{trash}, #{resourceId});
mapper.select: SELECT id, "apiDetailsId", name, "transferMethod", explanation, type, required, sample FROM public.parameters where "apiDetailsId" = #{id}
